attributes.action: Delay council tax payments of all councils
attributes.background:
I would like to see extra help in delaying council tax start date for all that pay to help with financial difficulty if someone has to come out of work.  
We are facing a financial crisis for many workers and every little helps

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
